roleset.name: to mar the appearance or beauty of
roleset.note: DISFIGURE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disfigure' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 44. (from disfigure.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: He had a big scar on his left cheek that-1 *trace*-1 disfigured his smooth face.
